title: Ep112: HMS Invincible - Doom at Jutland
itunes:title: Ep112: HMS Invincible - Doom at Jutland
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary explore the loss of HMS Invincible at 1916's Battle of Jutland. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or subscribe to our YouTube channel...
description:
Pete and Gary explore the loss of HMS Invincible at 1916's Battle of Jutland.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki
